HomePage.title: LuxeLiving
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Exclusive properties for the discerning renter. Experience luxury, comfort, and style in our curated collection of premium homes.

PropertiesPage.title: Our Exclusive
PropertiesPage.subtitle: Browse our hand-picked selection of premium properties.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.intro: We are more than just property managers; we are curators of exceptional living experiences. Since 2010, LuxeLiving has set the standard for premium property management.

tenant.title: Tenant Focused
tenant.desc: Our tenants are our priority. We provide white-glove service to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: We utilize state-of-the-art technology and rigorous verification processes to ensure safety and peace of mind.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.desc: Maintenance issue at 3 AM? We're here. Our support team is available around the clock.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: "We believe that a home is more than just a physical space; it's a sanctuary. That's why we meticulously select every property in our portfolio to ensure it meets our exacting standards of design, location, and quality. We don't just manage properties; we cultivate lifestyles."

cta.title: Ready to find your next home?

BookTour.title: Book a Tour
BookTour.subtitle: Schedule a viewing for
BookTour.successMessage: We've received your request for {property}. A leasing agent will contact you shortly.
